summary.span: 表示分层站点地图结构中的节点，例如 类和实现抽象 类的类所描述的节点。

span.span: Represents a node in the hierarchical site map structure such as that described by the class and classes that implement the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示站点地图结构中的网站页面。A object represents a Web site page in a site map structure. 在运行时使用一个或多个站点地图提供程序将站点地图数据从持久性存储加载到内存中，由静态类加载对象。 objects are loaded by the static class at run time using one or more site map providers to load site map data from persistent storage into memory. 对象由 类包装，供 Web 服务器控件（如控件）使用 。 objects are wrapped by the class for use by Web server controls, such as the control. 类包含多个属性，这些属性用于说明网站中的单个页面，包括描述页面的属性，如 、 和 属性。The class includes several properties that are used to describe a single page in a Web site, including properties that describe a page, such as the , , and properties. 属性由 类使用，该类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序，作为提供程序用于跟踪节点的内部集合中的查找键， 该类支持 可由站点地图提供程序用于跟踪节点的基本属性。Whereas the property is used by the class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, as a lookup key in the internal collections that the provider uses to track nodes, the class supports a basic property that can be used by site map providers to track nodes. 此外， 导航控件使用该属性在导航结构内呈现指向页面的超链接。Additionally, the property is used by navigation controls to render hyperlinks to pages within a navigation structure. 属性是的友好名称 ，通常与 Web 窗体的 HTML 标题相同，并由导航控件用于呈现简单标签。The property is a friendly name for the , is often the same as the HTML title of a Web Form, and is used by navigation controls to render simple labels. 最后， 可使用对象的站点地图提供程序提供附加属性的集合 ，但这些属性需要基类中不可用的其他属性 。Finally, a collection of additional attributes is available to site map providers that use objects, but require additional properties that are not available in the base class. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建新的站点地图节点集合并向其中添加元素。The first code example demonstrates how to create a new site map node collection and add elements to it. 第二个代码示例演示如何从文本文件加载站点地图数据。The second code example demonstrates how to load site map data from a text file. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建新 集合，然后使用方法将元素添加到其中 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new collection, and then add elements to it with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/CS/sitemapnode2acs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/VB/sitemapnode2avb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何 `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` 分析一个文本文件，其中包含以逗号分隔的字符串表示的站点地图数据。The following code example demonstrates how the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` parses a text file that contains site map data in comma-delimited strings. 新的 对象将添加到从该文件读取的每个行的类的内部跟踪集合中。A new object is added to the internal tracking collections of the class for each line that is read from the file. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类（它是 ASP.NET 的默认 提供程序实现）使用 属性作为查找键，如果在未提供 URL 的情况下为 (节点提供了该属性，则会为该节点) 生成跟踪标识符。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此， 提供 URL 并由使用的任何控件 必须在提供程序范围内具有唯一的 url。Therefore, any control that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类（它是 ASP.NET 的默认 提供程序实现）使用 属性作为查找键，如果在未提供 URL 的情况下为 (节点提供了该属性，则会为该节点) 生成跟踪标识符。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此， 提供 URL 并由使用的任何对象 必须在提供程序的作用域内具有唯一的 url。Therefore, any object that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 使用创建的特性集合 可通过属性获取 ，并可轻松地将其他特性应用于站点地图节点并扩展其功能，而无需派生自定义类来执行此操作。The collection of attributes that the is created with is available through the property, and makes it easy to apply additional attributes to a site map node and extend its capabilities without deriving a custom class to do so. 提供 角色集合以提供一组可在属性返回时查看节点的角色 `true` 。Supply an collection of roles to provide a set of roles that can view the node when the property returns `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 提供程序使用 属性作为查找键。The provider uses the property as a lookup key. 因此，使用的任何都 必须在 提供程序的作用域内具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any that is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 如果未 `title` `description` 提供或，则对或属性的调用将 返回一个 字段。If no `title` or `description` is provided, calls to the or properties return an field. 若要以编程方式为本地化指定资源，请将的值设置 `implicitResourceKey` 为一个唯一的名称，该名称将用于标识节点的本地化资源，或设置 `explicitResourceKeys` 为一个对集合的唯一名称， `name/value` 其中 `name` 是要本地化的节点属性或自定义属性，其中 `value` 包含节点属性或自定义属性的本地化值。To programmatically specify resources for localization, either set the value of `implicitResourceKey` to a unique name that will be used to identify localized resources for the node or set `explicitResourceKeys` to a collection of `name/value` pairs where `name` is the node property or custom attribute to localize and `value` contains localization values for the node property or custom attribute. 然后，可以在相应的 .resx 文件中设置本地化值。The localized values can then be set in the appropriate .resx files. 有关如何本地化 对象的、 和任何自定义属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：本地化站点地图数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc)。For more information about how to localize the , , and any custom properties of a object, see [How to: Localize Site-Map Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc). 有关集合的语法要求 `explicitResourceKeys` ，请参阅 。For the syntax requirements of the `explicitResourceKeys` collection, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性假设 对象实现其内部集合，以便当父节点检索其 属性时，节点的顺序与它们在站点映射中出现的顺序相同。The property presumes that the object implements its internal collections such that when a parent node retrieves its property, the nodes are in the same order as they appear in the site map. 如果你在站点地图提供程序的实现中使用 .NET Framework 集合类，请选择实现接口的集合 ，如 或 类。If you use .NET Framework collection classes in an implementation of a site map provider, choose collections that implement the interface, such as the or classes. 如果选择不实现接口的集合（ 如 类），则简单的站点导航操作可能会产生意外的结果。If you choose collections that do not implement the interface, such as the class, unexpected results can occur for simple site navigation operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序实现，它使用 属性作为查找键。The class, which is the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key. 因此， 类使用的任何对象都必须在 提供程序的作用域内具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any object that is used by the class must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 将忽略前导空格和尾随空白字符。Leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置对象的 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of a object. 将 `AccessSiteMapProvider` 其根节点存储为未定义的行 `parentnodeid` 。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` stores its root node as a row that has no `parentnodeid` defined. 使用对象返回行 ，并 从数据读取器中的值设置属性。The row is returned using an object, and properties are set from the values in the data reader. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]
